info.title: Neuronpedia API
info.description: This is Neuronpedia's API. You can test calls right in the browser. Requests for new APIs, questions, or feedback? Contact [johnny@neuronpedia.org](mailto:johnny@neuronpedia.org).

Explanation.description: Schema for a returned explanation or explanations.

get.description: Exports all explanations for a specific SAE. Warning: This can be a large response (>3 megabytes).

parameters.name: modelId
parameters.description: The model ID to that the SAE is for. For example, gpt2-small.

parameters.name: saeId
parameters.description: The SAE ID to export explanations for. For example, 6-res-jb.

get.description: Returns a feature, including its activations and explanations.

post.description: Gets activation values for a given feature when processing custom input text. Equivalent to going to a feature page and entering custom text. The example shows this feature https://neuronpedia.org/gpt2-small/9-res-jb/200

modelId.description: The model the feature is in.

layer.description: The SAE ID the feature is in.

400.description: Bad request, missing or invalid input

401.description: Unauthorized, user doesn't have access to the model or SAE set

post.description: Adds a bookmark for a specific feature to the authenticated user's bookmarks.

modelId.description: The ID of the model the feature belongs to

post.description: Deletes a bookmark for a specific feature from the authenticated user's bookmarks.

modelId.description: The ID of the model the feature belongs to

post.description: Generates an explanation for a specific feature using the specified explanation type and model. IMPORTANT- this requires you to set your OpenAI/Anthropic/Google auto-interp API keys under Neuronpedia Settings.

modelId.description: The ID of the model the feature belongs to

explanationType.description: The type of explanation to generate. Currently supported types are "oai_attention-head" and "oai_token-act-pair".

explanationModelName.description: The name of the model to use for generating the explanation. Currently supported models are "gpt-4o", "gpt-4o-mini", "gpt-4-turbo", "gpt-3.5-turbo", "claude-3-5-sonnet-20240620", "gemini-1.5-flash", and "gemini-1.5-pro".

post.description: Search for explanations in all features on Neuronpedia. Takes a query and returns up to 20 results at a time.

query.description: The search query. For example, "new york".

post.description: Search for explanations within a specific model. Takes a query and returns up to 20 results at a time.

modelId.description: The ID of the model to search within.

post.description: Search for explanations within a specific release. Takes a query and returns up to 20 results at a time.

releaseName.description: The name of the release to search within.

post.description: Search for explanations in the features of one or more SAEs in a model. Takes a query and returns up to 20 results at a time.

modelId.description: The ID of the model. For example, "gemma-2b".

layers.description: The layers / SAE IDs to search. For example, ["0-res-jb", "6-res-jb"]

query.description: The search query. For example, "new york".

post.description: Adds one or more features to an existing list.

listId.description: The ID of the list to add features to

featuresToAdd.description: The features to add to the list. Takes a max of 100 features at a time.

modelId.description: The ID of the model the feature belongs to

200.description: Successfully added features to the list

post.description: Deletes an existing list that you own.

listId.description: The ID of the list to delete

schema.description: Returns true if the list was successfully deleted

post.description: Updates the description of a specific feature in a list.

listId.description: The ID of the list containing the feature

modelId.description: The ID of the model the feature belongs to

description.description: The new description for the feature

post.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific list.

listId.description: The ID of the list to retrieve

post.description: Retrieves all lists created by the authenticated user.
Creates a new list and adds specified features to it.

name.description: The name of the new list

testText.description: Optional test text for the list, which will show the activations for the text for all the features in the list.

features.description: The features to add to the list

layer.description: The SAE ID / layer name of the feature

url.description: The URL of the newly created list

name.description: The name of the created list

description.description: The description of the created list

post.description: Creates an empty new list for the authenticated user.

name.description: The name of the new list

testText.description: Optional test text for the list, which will show the activations for the text for all the features in the list.

url.description: The URL of the newly created list

name.description: The name of the created list

description.description: The description of the created list

post.description: Removes a specified feature from a list.

listId.description: The ID of the list from which to remove the feature

modelId.description: The ID of the model the feature belongs to

layer.description: The layer name or SAE ID of the feature

post.description: Updates an existing list's metadata.

listId.description: The ID of the list to update

name.description: The new name for the list

description.description: The new description for the list

defaultTestText.description: Optional new default test text for the list

url.description: The URL of the newly created list

name.description: The updated name of the list

description.description: The updated description of the list

post.description: Returns the top features for a given text input. Equivalent to the https://neuronpedia.org/search functionality. Contact us to increase your rate limit for free if you hit it.

text.description: The custom text to run through the model.

selectedLayers.description: The SAE IDs to search. Use [] to search all SAEs in this SAE set.

sortIndexes.description: The token(s) to sort by. Specify multiple to sort by the sum of the selected tokens. Use [] to sort by max activation of any token (default behavior). In this "hello world" example, a <|endoftext|> is automatically prepended, so sorting by index 1 means we sort by token " hello".

ignoreBos.description: Don't return results where the top token activation is the BOS token.

densityThreshold.description: Don't return features with a density greater than this threshold. Should be between 0 and 1. -1 means no threshold (default).

numResults.description: The max number of results to return. May return fewer if density threshold is used. Max is 100.

400.description: Invalid request body or missing search text.

500.description: Internal server error during the search process.

post.description: Given chat messages and a set of SAE features, steer a model to generate both its default and steered chat completions. This is for chat, not completions.
Given a prompt and a set of SAE features, steer a model to generate both its default and steered text. This is for completions, not chat.

example.prompt: The most iconic structure on Earth is

post.description: Deletes an existing vector on Neuronpedia. You can only delete vectors you created.

index.description: Index of the vector to delete

post.description: Returns details for a specific vector by model ID, source and index
Returns all vectors owned by the authenticated user
Creates a new vector to store on Neuronpedia

hookType.description: Hook type. Currently only "resid-pre" is supported.

vector.description: The vector's values. Must match the model's dimension.
